hypothesis_content.title: Holiday Weekend Reversal Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: During NEUTRAL regimes, sharp price moves (>2.5%) in the final 2 hours of Friday trading (NY close) that reverse direction at Monday's open provide a reliable mean reversion signal when liquidity is thin.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Holiday lull creates exaggerated moves on thin liquidity that reverse when real money returns. Current news mentions 'holiday lull' and ETF outflows creating temporary dislocations.
entry_conditions: BTC shows >2.5% move in final 2 hours of Friday (3-5 PM ET)
Monday's opening 30-minute candle moves opposite Friday's late move by >0.8%
Volume on Monday open is <70% of Friday's late move volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 1.8% profit target (capturing 70% of Friday's late move)
exit_conditions.time_exit: Close position EOD Monday regardless of P&L

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Friday's late moves continue through Monday >60% of time in neutral regimes over 100 observations
